channel.title: Roger Hunt - AI Innovation Hub
channel.description: AI Engineering, Philosophy, and Healthcare Innovation

item.title: New Book Release and Platform Launches!
item.description:
Announcing the release of 'Vibes and the Art of AI Engineering' on Amazon, plus the launch of Ludwitt.com for AI-powered philosophy exploration and IUICalc.org for fertility analysis.
Key Highlights: - New book: "Vibes and the Art of AI Engineering" now on Amazon - Launch of Ludwitt.com: AI-powered philosophy platform - Release of IUICalc.org: Fertility analysis and insights
